issue.message: Lint found one or more custom checks using its older Java API; these checks are still run in compatibility mode, but this causes duplicated parsing, and in the next version lint will no longer include this legacy mode. Make sure the following lint detectors are upgraded to the new API: butterknife.lint.InvalidR2UsageDetector

On SDK version 23 and up, your app data will be automatically backed up and restored on app install. Consider adding the attribute `android:fullBackupContent` to specify an `@xml` resource which configures which files to backup. More info: https://developer.android.com/training/backup/autosyncapi.html
